summary: The raunchy, spunky tale of the rise and fall of an all-girl rock band from Portland, Oregon.
cast: Zoë Poledouris|Kinnie Starr|Nicole Barrett|Melody Moore|Coyote Shivers|Brendan O'Hara|Mikael Jehanno|Jennifer Shepard|Shawn Robinson|Sierra Feldner-Shaw|Lemmy|Kate Merrill|Janis Tanaka|Inger Lorre|Chase Caterina|Todd Coleman Smee
keywords: portland oregon|female singer|female drummer|female bassist|female guitarist
title: Down and Out with the Dolls
